text: K-space can refer to: *Another name for the spatial frequency domain of a spatial Fourier transform **Reciprocal space, containing the reciprocal lattice of a spatial lattice **Momentum space, or wavevector space, the vector space of possible values of momentum for a particle **k-space (magnetic resonance imaging) *Another name for a compactly generated space in topology *K-space (functional analysis) is an F-space such that every twisted sum by the real line splits *K-Space (band), a British-Siberian music ensemble
title: K-space
